title: Border Battle, Rep. Omar AIPAC Tweet & 2020
itunes:title: Border Battle, Rep. Omar AIPAC Tweet & 2020
description:
Kevin discussed border funding negotiations, Freshman Rep. Omar's apology over anti-semitic remarks and the latest presidential candidates for 2020 with guests Dan Lippman, Politico Playbook Co-Author and Jack Fitzpatrick, Bloomberg Government Congressional Reporter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
